TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRawElementProviderFragment implements class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: 公开用户界面 (UI) 元素的方法和属性，这些元素是多于一个层次深度的结构的一部分，例如列表框或列表项。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties on user interface (UI) elements that are part of a structure more than one level deep, such as a list box or a list item.

summary.span: 由 UI 自动化提供程序实现。

span.span: Implemented by UI Automation providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 片段的根节点必须支持继承自的接口。The root node of the fragment must support the interface, which inherits from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BoundingRectangle As Rect
public: property System::Windows::Rect BoundingRectangle { System::Windows::Rect get(); };

span.span: Gets the bounding rectangle of this element.

value.span: 以屏幕坐标形式表示的边框。

span.span: The bounding rectangle, in screen coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果元素部分被遮住或部分在屏幕之外, 则不需要进行剪切。No clipping is required if the element is partly obscured or partly off-screen. 应将属性设置为指示矩形是否实际可见。The property should be set to indicate whether the rectangle is actually visible. 并非边界矩形内的所有点都是可单击的。Not all points within the bounding rectangle are necessarily clickable. ## Examples 在下面的示例代码中, 边框的内部状态保留在中, 后者在返回之前将转换为。In the following example code, the internal state of the bounding rectangle is kept in a , which is converted to a before being returned. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FragmentRoot As IRawElementProviderFragmentRoot

span.span: Retrieves the root node of the fragment.
The root node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现的提供程序应返回自身。A provider that implements should return itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示片段中某个元素的实现, 例如列表框中的列表项。The following code example shows an implementation for an element in a fragment, such as a list item within a list box. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] GetEmbeddedFragmentRoots() cil managed

summary.span: 检索包含嵌入在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素树中的片段根的一个数组，该元素树以当前元素作为根节点。

span.span: Retrieves an array of fragment roots that are embedded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree rooted at the current element.
An array of root fragments, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当当前元素承载另一个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]框架时, 此方法才返回片段的数组。This method returns an array of fragments only if the current element is hosting another [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] framework. 大多数提供程序`null`返回。Most providers return `null`.

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

span.span: Server-side UI Automation Provider Implementation

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32[] GetRuntimeId() cil managed

summary.span: 检索元素的运行时标识符。

span.span: Retrieves the runtime identifier of an element.

returns.span: 元素的唯一运行时标识符。

span.span: The unique run-time identifier of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于对应于`null`窗口句柄的元素, 实现应返回。Implementations should return `null` for an element that corresponds to a window handle. 其他元素应返回一个数组, 该数组包含, 后跟一个在片段中唯一的值。Other elements should return an array that contains , followed by a value that is unique within the fragment. 提供商负责确保片段中的唯一性;例如, 列表中的每一项都必须单独进行编号。It is the provider's responsibility to ensure uniqueness within the fragment; for example, each item in a list must be individually numbered. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]引擎通过转换值来确保标识符在所有实例中都是唯一的。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] engine ensures that the identifier is unique among all instances, by translating the value. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示了此方法的实现, 该元素由片段内的元素 (如列表框中的项) 来实现。The following example code shows an implementation of this method by an element within a fragment, such as an item within a list box. 该项在此片段的此实例中具有自己的唯一标识符, 并且值可确保方法返回的标识符[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]在树中是唯一的。The item has its own unique identifier within this instance of the fragment, and the value ensures that the identifier returned by the method is unique in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#101)]

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

span.span: Server-side UI Automation Provider Implementation

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment Navigate(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Provider.NavigateDirection direction) cil managed
Public Function Navigate (direction As NavigateDirection) As IRawElementProviderFragment

span.span: The direction in which to navigate.

summary.span: 按照指定方向在树中检索 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素。

span.span: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element in a specified direction within the tree.

returns.span: 指定方向中的元素；如果该方向中没有任何元素，则为

span.span: The element in the specified direction, or if there is no element in that direction

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]对此方法的实现定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素树的结构。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] server's implementations of this method define the structure of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree. 导航必须向上、向下到第一个和最后一个子对象, 并向下一个和上一个同级节点 (如果适用)。Navigation must be supported upward to the parent, downward to the first and last child, and laterally to the next and previous siblings, as applicable. 每个子节点都只有一个父节点, 并且必须置于从父节点到达的同级的链 (和)。Each child node has only one parent and must be placed in the chain of siblings reached from the parent by and . 同级之间的关系必须在这两个方向相同: 如果 A 是B, 则 B 是A。Relationships among siblings must be identical in both directions: if A is B's , then B is A's . 没有,且没有。 A has no , and a has no . 片段根不支持导航到父级或同级;片段根间的导航由默认的窗口提供程序进行处理。Fragment roots do not enable navigation to a parent or siblings; navigation among fragment roots is handled by the default window providers. 片段中的元素必须仅导航到该片段内的其他元素。Elements in fragments must navigate only to other elements within that fragment. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示了的实现 , 它具有一个子元素。The following example code shows the implementation of by a fragment root that has a single child element. 由于实现元素是一个片段根元素, 因此它不允许导航到父元素或同级元素。Because the implementing element is a fragment root, it does not enable navigation to a parent element or sibling elements. [!code-csharp[UIAProvider_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/CSharp/FragmentRoot.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAProvider_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/VisualBasic/FragmentRoot.vb#105)] 下面的示例演示一个实现, 该实现表示列表框中的单个项。The following example shows an implementation by a fragment that represents a single item within a list box. 在这种情况下, 元素允许导航到其父级和同级, 但不允许导航到任何子级。In this case, the element enables navigation to its parent and siblings, but not to any children. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#103)]

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

span.span: Server-side UI Automation Provider Implementation

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetFocus() cil managed

span.span: Sets the focus to this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]调用此方法之前, 框架将确保承载此片段的接口部分已获得焦点。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] framework will ensure that the part of the interface that hosts this fragment is already focused before calling this method. 你的实现应仅更新其内部焦点状态;例如, 通过重新绘制列表项以显示其具有焦点。Your implementation should update only its internal focus state; for example, by repainting a list item to show that it has the focus. 如果你[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]不想将焦点放在父窗口上, 则为片段根设置选项。If you prefer that [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] not focus the parent window, set the option in for the fragment root.

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

span.span: Server-side UI Automation Provider Implementation
